mapper.select: select game_id,classify_order,paytimes_classify,sum(user_num) user_num from inner_game.pay_user_paytimes_week_distri where game_id = #{game_id} and data_date between #{start_date} and #{end_date} group by classify_order,paytimes_classify order by classify_order

select game_id,classify_order,paytimes_classify,sum(user_num) user_num from inner_game.pay_user_paytimes_month_distri where game_id = #{game_id} and data_date between #{start_date} and #{end_date} group by classify_order,paytimes_classify order by classify_order
